entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 09:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: S 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Rain beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
